description: Jump right over the boards and stay onside for this Alexa Skill that expands your knowledge and history of the sport of ice hockey. Simply ask Alexa for a hockey fact, and she'll saucer pass one right to you. Take a 2-minute minor for quizzing Alexa on hockey, and you may find yourself in the Penalty Box!
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask the Penalty Box to tell me a hockey fact.
Alexa, use the Penalty Box to tell me some hockey trivia.
name: Penalty Box
shortDescription: Get a fun hockey fact from a grab-bag of trivia about the sport that uses a stick and a puck!
